message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand that $80 is a great price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell it to you for $98. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $92?
I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell it to you for $96. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not quite there. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can sell it to you for $95. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to sell, but I'm really looking to get to $90. I'm not sure I can go any higher. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
